mapper.update: update tag set name=#{tag.name} where id=#{tag.id}
UPDATE tag SET blog_nums = ( SELECT count(id) FROM blog WHERE tag_ids LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tagId}, '%') ) WHERE id = #{tagId}
mapper.select: select * from tag where name=#{name} limit 1
select * from tag order by blog_nums desc
select * from tag where id=#{id} limit 1
select * from tag order by blog_nums desc limit #{nums}
select id from tag where blog_nums in (SELECT max(blog_nums) from tag) limit 1
select tag_id from blog_relation_tag where blog_id=#{blogId}
mapper.delete: delete from tag where id=#{id} limit 1
